thread.title: Roy Keane blasts Barcelona players after their stunning PSG comeback: This is why
thread.title_full: Roy Keane blasts Barcelona players after their stunning PSG comeback: This is why

title: Roy Keane blasts Barcelona players after their stunning PSG comeback: This is why
text:
Roy Keane blasts Barcelona players after their stunning PSG comeback: This is why ROY KEANE has criticised Barcelona’s players for celebrating their stunning comeback victory over Paris Saint-Germain with dressing room selfies. PUBLISHED: 09:55,   10:03, Thu, Mar 9, 2017 
Barcelona stunned PSG with a 6-1 victory last night to overturn their 4-0 first-leg defeat and reach   quarter-finals.Barca boss Luis Enrique admitted he had injured himself celebrating after Sergi Roberto’s winner sealed a 6-5 aggregate victory.The Nou Camp went wild on the stoppage-time winner, with the celebrations continuing inside the dressing room. COME NNN hank you all all all of you VISCA BARÇA and all our supporters pic.twitter.com/yCRWhVTuXl
